collections.name: doctors

properties.name: doc_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each doctor in the system

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: The first name of the doctor

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: The last name of the doctor

properties.name: specialty
properties.description: The specialty of the doctor, which can be one of the following: dermatology, immunology, general, or oncology

properties.name: year_reg
properties.description: Year the doctor was registered and obtained license

properties.name: med_school_name
properties.description: The name of the medical school where the doctor graduated

properties.name: city
properties.description: The city where the doctor is located

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state where the doctor is located, by its capitalized two-letter abbreviation

properties.name: zip_code
properties.description: The zip code where the doctor is located

properties.name: board_certification_number
properties.description: The board certification number of the doctor

collections.description: All the doctors registered in the system

collections.name: patients

properties.name: patient_id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each patient in the system

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: The first name of the patient

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: The last name of the patient

properties.name: date_of_birth
properties.description: The date the patient was born

properties.name: date_of_registration
properties.description: The date the patient was registered in the system

properties.name: gender
properties.description: The gender of the patient, which can either 'Male', 'Female', or 'Others'

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email of the patient used for contact information

properties.name: phone
properties.description: The phone number of the patient used for contact information

properties.name: street_address
properties.description: The street address of the patient's home, including street name and number

properties.name: city
properties.description: The city of the patient's address

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state of the patient's address, by its capitalized two-letter abbreviation

properties.name: zip_code
properties.description: The zip code of the patient's address

properties.name: insurance_type
properties.description: The type of insurance the patient has, which can be one of the following: private, medicare, medicaid, or uninsured

properties.name: insurance_policy_number
properties.description: The policy number of the patient's insurance (null if uninsured)

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the patient in centimeters

properties.name: weight
properties.description: The weight of the patient in kilograms

collections.description: The personal & registration information about every patient registered in the system

collections.name: drugs

properties.name: drug_id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each drug in the system

properties.name: drug_name
properties.description: The brand name of the drug

properties.name: manufacturer
properties.description: The name of the company who produces the drug

properties.name: drug_type
properties.description: The category of drug, which can be one of the following: 'biologic', 'small molecule', or 'topical'

properties.name: mechanism_of_activation
properties.description: The mechanism of activation of the drug

properties.name: fda_approval_date
properties.description: The date the drug was approved by the FDA (null if not approved because it is still under trial)

properties.name: administration_route
properties.description: The means used to administer the drug, which can be one of the following: 'oral', 'injection' or 'topical'

properties.name: recommended_dosage_amount
properties.description: The recommended amount of the drug to be taken per dose, where the unit is specified in the dosage_units property

properties.name: dosage_units
properties.description: The unit used by recommended_dosage_amount, which is either `mg` (for milligrams) or `g` (for grams)

properties.name: dose_frequency_hours
properties.description: The recommended number of hours between dosages

properties.name: national_drug_code
properties.description: The national drug code of the drug, which is a unique identifier assigned to each drug by the FDA

collections.description: The drugs listed in the system, which are used for treatment of patients

collections.name: diagnoses

properties.name: _id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each diagnosis in the system

properties.name: code
properties.description: The code of the diagnosis, which is a unique identifier assigned to each diagnosis by the ICD-10 system

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the diagnosis, in medical terms

properties.name: description
properties.description: An elaboration of the diagnosis, in more layman's terms and/or with some symptoms included
sample values: Plaque psoriasis, the most common form
Includes flexural, erythrodermic, and other rare types
Widespread pustules on top of red skin

collections.description: Records of each diagnosis in the system, which are identified when treating patients

collections.name: treatments

properties.name: treatment_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each treatment record in the system

properties.name: patient_id
properties.description: The id of the patient who is receiving the treatment

properties.name: doc_id
properties.description: The id of the doctor who is administering the treatment

properties.name: drug_id
properties.description: The id of the drug being used in the treatment

properties.name: diagnosis_id
properties.description: The id of the diagnosis the patient is being treated for

properties.name: start_date
properties.description: The date the treatment began

properties.name: end_date
properties.description: The date the treatment ended (null if ongoing)

properties.name: is_placebo
properties.description: True if the treatment is a placebo, false otherwise

properties.name: total_drug_amount
properties.description: The total quantity of the drug used in the treatment, where the unit is specified in the drug_unit property

properties.name: drug_unit
properties.description: The unit used by total_drug_amount, which is either `mg` (for milligrams) or `g` (for grams)

collections.description: The records of each treatment administered to patients in the system, which can be either a drug or a placebo

collections.name: outcomes

properties.name: outcome_id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each treatment outcome in the system

properties.name: treatment_id
properties.description: The id for the treatment that the outcome is related to

properties.name: assessment_date
properties.description: The date when the outcome assessment was made

properties.name: day7_lesion_count
properties.description: The number of lesions counted on the patient's skin at day 7 after treatment started

properties.name: day30_lesion_count
properties.description: The number of lesions counted on the patient's skin at day 30 after treatment started (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day100_lesion_count
properties.description: The number of lesions counted on the patient's skin at day 100 after treatment started (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day7_pasi_score
properties.description: The PASI score calculated at day 7 after treatment started, (Psoriasis Area and Severity Index) which is a measure of the severity of psoriasis from 0 to 72

properties.name: day30_pasi_score
properties.description: The PASI score calculated at day 30 after treatment started, (Psoriasis Area and Severity Index) which is a measure of the severity of psoriasis from 0 to 72 (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day100_pasi_score
properties.description: The PASI score calculated at day 100 after treatment started, (Psoriasis Area and Severity Index) which is a measure of the severity of psoriasis from 0 to 72 (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day7_tewl
properties.description: TEWL score (Transepidermal Water Loss) calculated at day 7 after treatment started, which is a measure of skin hydration

properties.name: day30_tewl
properties.description: TEWL score (Transepidermal Water Loss) calculated at day 30 after treatment started, which is a measure of skin hydration, in n g/m^2/h (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day100_tewl
properties.description: TEWL score (Transepidermal Water Loss) calculated at day 100 after treatment started, which is a measure of skin hydration, in n g/m^2/h (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day7_itch_vas
properties.description: The itch visual analog scale (VAS) score at day 7 after treatment started, which is a measure of itch severity from 0 to 100

properties.name: day30_itch_vas
properties.description: The itch visual analog scale (VAS) score at day 30 after treatment started, which is a measure of itch severity from 0 to 100 (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day100_itch_vas
properties.description: The itch visual analog scale (VAS) score at day 100 after treatment started, which is a measure of itch severity from 0 to 100 (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day7_hfg
properties.description: Hair growth factor (HGF) score at day 7 after treatment started, on a scale from 0 to 5

properties.name: day30_hfg
properties.description: Hair growth factor (HGF) score at day 30 after treatment started, on a scale from 0 to 5 (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day100_hfg
properties.description: Hair growth factor (HGF) score at day 100 after treatment started, on a scale from 0 to 5 (null if not enough time has passed)

collections.description: The recorded outcomes of treatments, which can include the same treatment at different points in time if not enough time has elapsed to record the complete outcome for a treatment

collections.name: concomitant_meds

properties.name: _id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each concomitant medication record in the system

properties.name: treatment_id
properties.description: The id of the treatment that the concomitant medication record is related to

properties.name: medicine_name
properties.description: The name of the medicine being taken by the patient as a concomitant drug

properties.name: start_date
properties.description: Date the concomitant drug treatment was started

properties.name: end_date
properties.description: Date the concomitant drug treatment finished (null if ongoing)

properties.name: dose_amount
properties.description: The amount of the medicine taken per dose, where the unit is specified in the dose_unit property

properties.name: dose_unit
properties.description: The unit used by dose_amount

properties.name: dose_frequency
properties.description: The frequency of the dose in hours (null if one-time use)

collections.description: Records of medications that are taken by patients in addition to the treatment they are receiving during their treatment

collections.name: adverse_events

properties.name: _id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each adverse event record in the system

properties.name: treatment_id
properties.description: The id for the treatment that the adverse event occurred during

properties.name: reported_date
properties.description: The date the adverse event was reported

properties.name: description
properties.description: Descriptor of the adverse event, which can be a single word or a phrase

collections.description: All records of adverse events that have been reported in the system  related to a treatment

relationships.name: doctor
relationships.description: The doctor who administered the treatment

relationships.name: prescribed_treatments
relationships.description: The treatments prescribed/administered by the doctor

relationships.name: patient
relationships.description: The patient who the treatment was administered to

relationships.name: treatments_received
relationships.description: The drug treatment regimens the patient has been a part of

relationships.name: drug
relationships.description: The drug being used as part of the treatment

relationships.name: treatments_used_in
relationships.description: The treatments the drug was used in

relationships.name: diagnosis
relationships.description: The diagnosis associated with the treatment which the drug is treating

relationships.name: treatments_for
relationships.description: The drug treatment regimens targeted at a patient with this diagnosis

relationships.name: outcome_records
relationships.description: The reported outcomes of the treatment, which can include the same treatment at different points in time if not enough time has elapsed to record the complete outcome for a treatment

relationships.name: treatment
relationships.description: The treatment that the outcome record is reporting on

relationships.name: concomitant_meds
relationships.description: The ancillary medications that were taken by a patient in addition to the treatment they are receiving during their treatment

relationships.name: treatment
relationships.description: The treatment that the administration of the concomitant medication was related to

relationships.name: adverse_events
relationships.description: Any incident events recorded in association with the treatment

relationships.name: treatment
relationships.description: The treatment that the adverse event occurred during
